content.raw: @nkoenig The problem I'm trying to solve is leaving behind a rogue gzserver process when a test fails (to reproduce put an `assert(0);` somewhere between `init()` and `fini()` in a test in `gz_TEST.cc`. It will leave a gzserver process behind `ps -e | grep gzerver` that will break all future attempts to launch gazebo). I agree it's a band-aid not a fix, but I don't know what the fix would be. I was trying to offer something helpful.
